CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Perella Weinberg Partners is a global independent investment banking firm. It provides strategic, financial, and tactical advice in connection with executing complex mergers, acquisitions, company sales, and corporate divestitures, including carve-outs, joint ventures, and spin-offs, and relating to takeover preparedness and defense.
